Params[3]: Luna is sitting on a bench in the plaza. In the center of the plaza is a huge shark statue.
Under the shark statue is an eastern-looking family crest with a name inscribed in gold—Shark-speare.
Luna is absentmindedly glancing at a poster next to the bench. It shows a comical image of Shark-speare holding its arms over its head and running away.
This shark mascot can be seen everywhere in the water park, from building decorations to souvenirs.
...What a loving grandfather you have.
Luna looks up at the statue of Shark-speare. It is playing children's songs on a loop.
Let's play!
Shark-speare loves gingerbread men!
With Shark-speare's singing flowing past her ears, Luna arrives before the statue. She touches it gently with one hand, and a sanguine bolt flashes across the statue.
Incoming connection request—
The electronic voice is coming from Luna's bracelet, with the dialer's name displayed in the center of the screen. Luna taps the bracelet lightly and connects.
The wrap-up work in Kowloong is complete.
According to the reports from my informants, Babylonia will soon start collaborating with the ARU on something new.
Let them be. Our mission is more important right now.
Very well. I hope what you gain from this is worth all the trouble.
That will be none of your concern.
...Indeed. Allow me to apologize for overstepping.
I know your ways. Do keep in mind "who" you use them on.
Naturally. All for the Ascension-Network.
Hmph.
Luna disconnects.
The energy center beneath her feet roars, and along with the storm of virus swirling madly in the air, Luna knows—the show is about to begin.
